notes.text: You can now add print and export options to the Share menu
We now correctly handle paginator buttons when navigation is triggered
We've resolved an issue with grouping conditions in responsive tables that use analytical services
We've resolved an issue with sort and filter restrictions in table personalization in a containment scenario
Weâ€™ve resolved an issue with invoking the DefaultValuesFunction on list bindings that include navigation paths
You can now configure the threshold for the number of rows initially loaded in a table
You can now freeze columns in the Column Settings dialog and disable column freezing by using the disableColumnFreeze parameter
You can now attach event handlers to the list binding of tables and retrieve the row count.
We've now improved the documentation of the invokeAction method for the EditFlow controller extension
We now ensure that share links are correctly generated when adaptShareMetadata is overriden twice in a custom code
We've resolved an issue where the state of the flexible column layout wasn't stored correctly
